    public class ProfileActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    This activity handles the user's profile page.

      • onStart

        protected void onStart()
        Gets the username that was passed from the previous activity.

        In this case, it could be from the Friends, Search User, or Main activity. This activity determines which panel the user will see (ie. my profile, friend's profile, or stranger's profile).

        Overrides:
        onStart in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • goToInventory

        public void goToInventory(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Inventory" button on the user's Profile page.

        This method is used to send the user to their own Inventory page.

        Parameters:
        view - "Inventory" button on the user's Profile page

      • goToFriendInventory

        public void goToFriendInventory(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Inventory" button on a friend's Profile page.

        This method is used to send the user to a friend's Inventory page and pass the friend's name to the friend's Inventory activity.

        Parameters:
        view - "Inventory" button on a friend's Profile page

      • addFriend

        public void addFriend(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Add Friend" button.

        This method is used to add a friend to the user's friend list and run the "Update User Thread".

        Parameters:
        view - "Add Friend" button

      • editProfile

        public void editProfile(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Pencil" icon in their Profile page.

        This method is used to send the user to Edit Profile page.

        Parameters:
        view - "Pencil" icon

      • goToRecord

        public void goToRecord(android.view.View view)
        Called when the user presses the "Trade Record" button in their Profile page.

        This method is used to send the user to Trade Record page.

        Parameters:
        view - "Trade Record" button
